message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I understand its value to you, but my budget is limited. Would you consider accepting $16,000 for it?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is really my bottom line to make this work. I understand your budget constraints, so how about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I understand the value of the product, I am still working within a tight budget. Could we possibly agree on $17,000?
